channel.title: ABC15 Arizona | Phoenix AZ | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/ABC15

item.title: New extreme heat legislation that would give funding to resp
item.description: New extreme heat legislation that would give funding to respond to emergencies relating to extreme temperatures is moving forward.

item.title: Some adoption fees are still waived as many shelters and ani
item.description: Some adoption fees are still waived as many shelters and animal rescues are dealing with overcrowded kennels!

item.title: As many as 10 Doberman puppies are missing after a breeder w
item.description: As many as 10 Doberman puppies are missing after a breeder was killed in Colorado. Efforts are underway to locate them and solve his homicide.
